title: I for one, welcome our new Dr. Mundo overlords.
body: He really does go where he pleases. He also kills who he pleases. In all seriousness, I honestly think people are overlooking just how strong tanks have become while the endless qq about adc is still going on. Has anyone actually bothered looking at how goddamn good some of these tanks are right now (in spite of the GW changes which everyone assumed would gut Mundo)? He's making Yasuo look like a joke champion right now.

replies.body:
Wait until people stop bringing 4/5 AD comps so that Mundo can't become immortal by building {{item:3047}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3083}} 

Also, people are still figuring out how to itemize AD champions.  It's a matter of time before they start fitting {{item:3033}} {{item:3153}}  into their builds VS Mundo instead of always trying to build 100% crit chance {{item:3006}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3046}}  in every game.

don't forget....Lord Dominik sends his Regards....

This. The reason people theorized this would be doom for tanks is because it should have been. The tools for ADCs and AD assassins to thrive are here, people just want to be able to 2 hit squishies more than they want to not be pentakilled by a Rammus, Malphite, Mundo, or Taric.

You forget that Riot missed a spot and forgot to remove some bullshit from the game.

Like Fiora.

To be fair, most tanky damage dealers make Yasuo look like a joke.
--------------------
Also, the Grievous Wounds changes actually assume someone buys the bloody item against him.

I have had several teams when I'm playing a tank where none of the damage deals are willing to pick up Mortal Reminder or Morellonomicon when the enemy team has a Dr. Mundo and one/two other tanks.  They didn't bother getting Lord Dominik's Regards either, which was quite sad.

Plus many teams just pick 4 AD champions and act surprised when they can't kill the enemy tanks.  It's really quite sad, but that is solo-queue.

Btw full true tanks got needed in the preseason, the reason Mundo is doing well is cuz he's a juggernaut, and no one counter builds him. If adcs counter built tanks and juggernauts ( different classes of champions ) then they would be weaker. Mundo would be fair and TANKS would be seen less often unless they build dmg.

Will not deny the fact that I'm loving playing sion right now though. NOONE COUNETBUILDS; I literally get Fh, Mercs, steraks, mallet, titanic and visage and wreck everyone.

esp. because ppl don't realize that mundo is himself a carry--the one and only carry tank! you *have* to stomp him early, you *have* to counterbuild him late, just like a lategame ekko or jinx, because otherwise you're all gonna die!
also gotta try my juggervana and jugger'sai builds out...see where they go.

I won't pick Grevious Wounds when the rest of my team is useless. I'll keep my gold for items that are of greater use to me.
If you want GW, you should've thought about it before you turned the game into a 2vs8.

I'm not sure how you typically build tanks, but I can assure you that neither Morellonomicon nor Executioner's Calling are priority purchases on Rammus.  

Considering that I mentioned Mortal Reminder would be a good second or third purchase against their team before our team left the fountain and a couple times afterwards...

Besides, the enemy team had multiple champions stacking armor,one of whom had a significant amount of regeneration.  I don't see how Mortal Reminder (which provides bonus armor penetration and Grievous Wounds) would be a waste of gold in that situation.
I can hear the sound of you missing my point. Woooooosh it makes, while flying over your head.

Get a hold of yourself, man!

*Thug lyfe*

Kappa

Mundo can get away with just buying things like Warmogs over Thornmail against an AD comp though since he does well with health and regen.

Black Cleaver I often find a bit wasted on Sion. He doesn't hit frequently enough to really use it compared to, say, Garen. I personally go for Frozen Mallet or Maw of Malmortius if I need damage.
I usually get it for the CDR.  Capping CDR makes his ult a 36 second cooldown at max rank.  It's probably just a habit of mine, I like CDR on a lot of my champions as I tend to use abilities a lot.

1. Not all tanks are strong
2. When the popularity of squishy ADCs(both range and melee)rises to disgusting levels, so will the popularity of their natural counters
3. The whole game is a cancerous ball of snowballing mess with 100%crit-chance and no counterplay
4. Those tanks you call strong, are also the most basic of their class; they require no real skill or mechanics to do well, just don't die and farm.

'no counterplay' 
Just stop that BS, ok?

List of good tanks/Juggs:
- Amumu
- Sejuani
- Malphite
- Dr. Mundo
- Tahm'Kench
- Garen
- susaN
- Nautilus
- Shen
- Zac
- Sion
- list goes on, I am lazy
- not even counting the bruiseresque champions

This patch is AWESOME for those who play tanks. Yes, ADC's are incredibly strong. But both teams have ADC's. Seeing how assassins suck atm (take a look at their winrates/avg. games played, they hit the GROUND as in 40-45%) because they can't assassinate the ADC overlords you gotta play tanks who are either able to peel for their own ADC to make him/her even stronger or CC the other ADC.
Even though it may be counterintuitive, this is probably the best patch for tank players since the best times of Cinderhulk.
And yes, I am not kidding. Numbers prove my point.

I literally see nothing wrong with your post, it just re-enforces my point.

Also, that counterplay thingy, yeah there's no counterplay to Yasuo, Tryndamere, 80%crit chance Vayne, Graves, those other fringe cases that abuse the living shit out of items and keystones. That's all that's getting played right now.

However, I do believe this is not an awesome patch for tanks based on game health. It's simply because what they are built to counter has disgustingly risen in popularity. At the best times of Cinderhulk however(after it got nerfed), it truly was a great time to play the game, it was the most healthy it had been the entire season. That's personal opinion though, and you don't have to like it.

Playing tanks right now feels like a weapon manufacturer during a war. Profits go up because of demand, not because someone wanted an update to their national arsenal. Lastly, you can't deny the tanks with the best winrates are the most mechanically simplistic, I've seen the numbers myself.

Seeing a lot of these posts in these days regarding how much strong is mundo but i really don't understand tbh, how can he be so strong? I mean greavious wound now is a lot easier to get and if you buy that 800 gold item it's gg... or am i missing something?
Just asking because i never played with/against mundo in these days and i have no idea of what you guys are talking about :)

> [{quoted}](name=LordBrasca,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LXlz2Pe6,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-11-17T12:06:40.068+0000)
>
> Seeing a lot of these posts in these days regarding how much strong is mundo but i really don't understand tbh, how can he be so strong? I mean greavious wound now is a lot easier to get and if you buy that 800 gold item it's gg... or am i missing something?
> Just asking because i never played with/against mundo in these days and i have no idea of what you guys are talking about :)

His E did get a buff with the last patch that gives him a deal more burst now. It does bonus damage on the first hit after you use it that scales on health. So now you have a Q to slow and E to hit combo that proves a stronger trade off than his previous cleaver spam.

However, even though he does more damage now, the main issue is what everybody is saying. People just don't build against him. Most players are just too selfish and only choose high damage champs and build high damage on them instead of picking for team composition and building for the enemy composition. Grevious wounds now has more sources than before so his ult can be stopped far more often. Mundo's strongest power is enemy stupidity
You basically build full HP tank, Titanic Hydra, and your E deletes squishies.
